data.text: We put our empty panniers (3)in the box which pads the bike somewhat. We carried on one pannier and had a light weight backpack which folds. We put the rest of our stuff in a packable duffle which we now carry in the bottom of our panniers. Our biggest problem was not putting extra tape in the bottom of the bike box. They were obviously dragged along the ground and came open. I had some bike accessories in one pannier. Upon watching our next TSA transfer, we saw all items in the box thrown in a carton which they put through the X-ray machine!! Luckily I was only missing my front light attachment.
